EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for your interest in SpringOne Platform 2017
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello,
Thanks for your interest in SpringOne Platform 2017! We’ll be sure to keep you posted on all things SpringOne Platform including early registration, relevant deadlines, and new content planned for next year’s show.
Whether you're just embarking on your software transformation journey, or looking to completely replatform your IT to be more Agile and DevOps oriented, Pivotal can guide you on the right path.
Start building today with a step-by-step tutorial <[[https://pivotal.io/platform/pcf-tutorials/getting-started-with-pivotal-cloud-foundry]]> of how to get a sample app up and running using a free trial of Pivotal Cloud Foundry with Spring Cloud Services built in.
To hear how our customers are using Pivotal to transform how the world builds software, check out the recorded sessions <[[https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLAdzTan_eSPQ1fuLSBhyB4eEZF7JQM0Mx]]> from 2016’s SpringOne Platform conference; they cover a wide range of topics from Cloud Native Architectures, to Java, Data Microservices, DevOps, and much more.
Finally, take advantage of our library of resources:
- Customer case studies <[[https://pivotal.io/resources/case-studies]]> - Upcoming and on-demand webinars <[[https://pivotal.io/resources/webinars]]> and podcasts <[[https://pivotal.io/resources/podcasts]]> - Leading industry analyst reports <[[https://pivotal.io/resources/analyst-reports]]> - O’Reilly eBooks <[[https://pivotal.io/resources/1/ebooks]]> on Microservices, 12-factor authentication, and more
We hope you to see you next year at SpringOne Platform 2017!
Sincerely, The Pivotal Team
